trends: There has been one other sighting in Belle
There were no other sightings in Belle on or around June 30th 1974
divs: Sighting DetailsI was 16 years old and was driving around the town of Belle, Missouri, where I have lived all my life, on my way to work at a local cafe and I was coming down 8th Street toward Hwy. 28, and when I got to the stop sign at Hwy 28, it caught my eyes, across the highway off to the right a little bit, it was so big, I couldn't miss it! It was hovering, with no noise what so ever, just staying in one spot, a black triangular ship with lights on the three corners, which were rounded just a little and also windows going all the way around it, as far as I could see. It was unbeleiveably huge! I drove across highway 28 and stopped for a moment, then it hovered back into the woods off to the right a bit, but I could still see it there. It really scared & astonished me, I had to calm myself down a little,(I was afraid to get out of my car and start yelling and pointing), so then I drove into a parking lot to the left of the street and headed back down Highway 28 to get to work. I told a few people at work, but no one really believed me-I was still really shock up. This was before I had ever drank alcohol, smoked marijuana or anythng, so I know what I saw was there. After that I was always prone to a lot of nervous anxiety, insomnia, and depression. Still to this day I have to take xanax to help avoid panic attacks, which have landed me in the hospital a few times, thinking I was having a heart atack.
Summary: Afternoon-I saw a triangluar black ship with lights on the 3 corners and a row of windows around the ship
